content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: --PTCD
      operator: non_empty
    - name: --DECOD
      operator: empty
Core:
  Id: CDISC.SDTMIG.CG0050
  Version: '1'
  Status: Draft
Description: Raise an error when --DECOD is not populated but --PTCD is populated
Outcome:
  Message: --DECOD should be populated when --PTCD is populated
  Output Variables:
    - --TERM
    - --PTCD
    - --DECOD
Rule Type: Record Data
Sensitivity: Record
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0050
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: The preferred term code assigned to the event from
                  MedDRA.
                Document: Model v2.0
                Item: --PTCD
                Section: Events
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.3'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0050
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: MedDRA Preferred Term code.
                Document: Model v1.7
                Item: --PTCD
                Section: 2.2.2
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.2'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0050
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: MedDRA Preferred Term code.
                Document: Model v1.4
                Item: --PTCD
                Section: 2.2.2
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - EVENTS
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL

json.Description: Raise an error when --DECOD is not populated but --PTCD is populated

Outcome.Message: --DECOD should be populated when --PTCD is populated

Citations.Cited_Guidance: The preferred term code assigned to the event from MedDRA.
